pageProduct.name: Wagner Professional Turmeric 17500mg 60 Vegetarian Capsules
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Turmeric 17,500mg

Warnings

If symptoms persist, talk to your health professional. Do not use if cap seal or if inner seal is missing, torn or broken.

Common Uses

Turmeric 17,500mg contains high strength Turmeric, in the convenience of capsules. Turmeric relieves symptoms of mild arthritis, relieving mild joint inflammation and swelling, and mild joint aches and pains. Additionally, Turmeric contains antioxidants to reduce free radicals formed in the body, as well as having anti-inflammatory action.

Ingredients

ACTIVE INGREDIENTS: Each hard capsule contains: Curcuma longa (Turmeric) ext. dry conc. 500 mg from minimum rhizome dry 17.5 g stand. to contain curcuminoids 475 mg

Directions

RECOMMENDED DOSAGE: Adults: Take 2-3 hard capsules with water, once daily. Or as directed by your healthcare professional.
